#summary How to deploy UniMRCP client.
#labels Id-8,Phase-Deploy
==1. Overview ==
This guide describes how to deploy UniMRCP client by providing typical setups, appropriate configurations and sample network captures.

<br>
==2. Deployments ==
=== Deployment 1 ===
_Setup_: UniMRCP client allows to connect to MRCPv1 server. Both are on the same LAN.
<br>
<br>
http://sites.google.com/a/unimrcp.org/unimrcp/clientdeploymentdata/ea1.png?attredirects=0

_Configuration_: [http://sites.google.com/a/unimrcp.org/unimrcp/clientdeploymentdata/unimrcpclient1.xml?attredirects=0 unimrcpclient.xml]

_Sample Network Captures_: [http://sites.google.com/a/unimrcp.org/unimrcp/clientdeploymentdata/mrcp-tts1.pcap?attredirects=0 mrcp-tts.pcap] [http://sites.google.com/a/unimrcp.org/unimrcp/clientdeploymentdata/mrcp-asr1.pcap?attredirects=0 mrcp-asr.pcap]
